# Sky (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Duthila, Lliendil, Tuilviel Glithien |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Your fly speed (or glide speed) improves by 5 feet. Add [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5: Spot) to your list of [[Cleric|cleric]] class skills.

**Sky Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Raptor's Sight (Spell)|Raptorâ€™s Sight]]****:** Gain +5 on  [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5: Spot) checks; range increment penalty halved.

**2** **[[Summon Dire Hawk (Spell)|Summon Dire Hawk]]****:** Summons dire hawk to serve you.

**3** **[[Enduring Flight (Spell)|Enduring Flight]]****:** Carry medium loads at full fly speed; flight duration is doubled.

**4** **[[Aerial Alacrity (Spell)|Aerial Alacrity]]****:** +30 ft. fly speed, +1 AC and Reflex saves while flying, maneuverability improves by one category.

**5** **[[Control Winds (Spell)|Control Winds]]****:** Change wind direction and speed.

**6** **[[Wind Walk (Spell)|Wind Walk]]****:** You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

**7** **[[Reverse Gravity (Spell)|Reverse Gravity]]****:** Objects and creatures fall upward.

**8** **[[Mastery of the Sky (Spell)|Mastery of the Sky]]****:** Gain +2 on attack rolls and damage rolls while airborne; maneuverability becomes perfect; foes incur penalties against you.

**9** **[[Summon Devoted Roc (Spell)|Summon Devoted Roc]]****:** Summons powerful roc to serve you.
